synopsis.text: Arc rivals reunite in the New World as Luffy and the Straw Hat Pirates find themselves on the enigmatic island of Nebulandia, shrouded in a devil fruit-neutralizing fog. With their unique abilities rendered useless, the crew must confront their former Davy Back Fight opponents, the Foxy Pirates, who have bolstered their ranks with three new members: Dojaku, Kansho, and the cunning tactician Komei. Can the Straw Hats overcome this new challenge without relying on their devil fruit powers? Prepare for a thrilling rematch in this original anime special!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
